rules_text:
Trample
When Vartrossen Primalist enters, target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don’t control. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
{4}{G}: Transform Vartrossen Primalist. Activate only if it’s attacking.
rules_text2:
Trample
Whenever another Wolf or Werewolf enters under your control, it fights up to one target creature you don’t control.
At the beginning of your end step, if Vartrossen Packleader didn’t attack this turn, transform it.
